nodes.text: The Vault of Justice was a room within the Chamber of Antiquities, the complex of rooms that made up the base of the Great Jedi Library on Ossus. Located deep within the labyrinth of rooms and halls, the Vault contained the ancient artifact known as the Gauntlet of Neer. The room was forgotten during the evacuation of the planet during the Cron Supernova and the contents of the room were left undisturbed as of the Galactic Civil War.
